title: Flight Simulator 2020 - MSFS Update - Sim Update 15 - G3x touch review
description:
In this video we will have a look at the first beta of Sim Update 15 which has been release earlier today. We will first have a look at the release notes to see what has been fixed but also which new functionalities have been added. After that we will have a look at how you can join the beta, install the beta and last but not least provide your feedback to Asobo/Microsoft.

0:00 intro
0:10 review cockpit
1:19 review G3x touch
